casebody.data:
STATE
v.
BATES 2016-1783 Supreme Court of Ohio. February 6, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On motion to participate in oral argument scheduled for February 19, 2019, of amicus curiae, NAACP Legal Defense & Educational Fund, Inc. Motion granted. Amicus curiae shall share the time allotted to appellant.
